title: I lost power in my house won the game and lost lp
body: I was dominating my bot lane up 3 to 0 and my power went out in my house for about 10 minuets. I reconnected team was snowballing and we won however when we finished the game i lost lp . Who designed this system? Now apparently im down two wins and on the verge of being demoted.

replies.body: Your team was left at a disadvantage and though it wasn't your fault it may have lead them to a loss had you not returned. Power outages are a rare occurrence, so you shouldn't have to deal with it often. Hope the rest of your Season went okay and if you have any other issues make sure to let us know.
